Fix AI teammates moving away from teammate passes

Fixed issue where AI teammates would move away from or ignore balls set by their own teammates. AI now actively pursues teammate passes during the setup phase (touches 1-2).

Problem:
- When AI hit ball backward (negative vx) to set up teammates
- Receiving AI would predict the ball going backward and think it''s not in their zone
- They would return to default position instead of going for the ball
- Created broken 3-touch sequences where passes were ignored

Solution - Teammate Pass Detection:
- Added isTeammatePass check for each AI player
- Player team: vx < 0 AND touchCount < 3 (ball going backward on their side)
- CPU team: vx > 0 AND touchCount < 3 (ball going forward on their side)
- If detected as teammate pass within 200 units, AI actively pursues

Updated AI Decision Logic:
- Go for ball if: zone responsibility OR very close OR teammate pass nearby
- Teammate pass gets extended range (200 units vs 100 for normal balls)
- Ensures receiving AI moves toward setup passes
- Maintains zone coverage for non-pass situations

Benefits:
- AI now completes full 3-touch sequences properly
- Teammates actively receive sets from each other
- Realistic bump-set-spike coordination
- No more ignored passes or broken plays
- Smooth team coordination on all touches
